text: Green Mansions: A Romance of the Tropical Forest is a book by W. H. Hudson (William Henry Hudson). It was published in 1904. The story is about a jungle- dwelling girl, Rima, and Abel, the man who loves her. The story has been adapted to opera, a movie starring Audrey Hepburn, and comic books. ==More reading== *. Category:Books with jungle settings Category:British novels Category:1900s books Category:1904 works
title: Green Mansions
